name: Finance Game
description:
Do you wanna go back to a more simple gaming time? Have you ever wanted to play a text-based game again?

Finance Game is a Text-Based game,

I know... you can stop laughing now, no one is ever going to pay for a text based game. But the thing is, what if you could make money of it? Join our team of programmers and get a percentage of the game earnings by just adding code to it!, Finance Game is written in C++ which makes extra easy to modify the code. If you are interested on joining a programmers team and start making money, email us with your modification and we will contact you.

Finance Game isn´t only for programmers, you can also enjoy its immersive gameplay and dream about a simpler time. Create your own company from scratch!!!

Casino DLC aviable, bet all your money and become the king of Las Vegas!!!

[DLC by Johano98]

Multi-National DLC aviable, launch your business to the hole world!!!

[DLC by SparkSoftwareSA]

(Any new DLC programmed by the comunity will earn 20% of Finance-Game´s earnings!)
